Method Summary

  • ~ (Boolean) hasClass(el, className) Checks if element has class

Method Details

~ (Boolean) hasClass(el, className)

Checks if element has class

Examples:

hasClass(document.body, 'class-name');

Parameters:

  • el ( Element ) — the element to add class
  • className ( String ) — name of the class

Returns:

  • Boolean
